It is unclear whether the ROC actually claims Hong Kong . Former President Lee Teng-hui claimed that Hong Kong should have been returned to the ROC instead of the PRC because the ROC government had the original manuscript of the Treaty of Nanking . However , no president since Lee has made such claim . The ROC has never governed Hong Kong , and its constitution does not include Hong Kong as its territory
